name: Lamentation
flavorText: Ideal for crushing your enemies and driving them before you.
flavorTextHtml: Ideal for crushing your enemies and driving them before you.

secondary.textHtml: Rend can now stack up to 2 times on an enemy, and the damage of Rend is increased by 107%. (Barbarian Only) [100 - 150]%
